title: Frightened Soldiers
description: Ghosts of soldiers who cowered or fled during the calamity, who give the Lost One their soul in hopes it may help in battle against Ganon.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.

title: Brave Knights
description: Ghosts of soldiers who sacrificed themselves to save others during the calamity, who give the Lost One their soul in hopes it may help in battle against Ganon.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.

title: Royal Knights
description: Ghosts of distinguished knights who served under the Royal Guard, who give the Lost One their soul in hopes it may help in battle against Ganon.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.

title: Royal Guardsmen
description: Ghosts of who served at the side of the royal family, who give the Lost One their soul in hopes it may help in battle against Ganon.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.

title: Would be Champions
description: Ghosts of former rivals and prospective heroes, who give the Lost One their soul in hopes it may help in battle against Ganon.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.
